getTargetContext().Description: Return a Context for the target application being instrumented. Use this to get a @B_android#content#Context_E@ representing @B_android#app#Instrumentation#getTargetContext_E@ into your test.

Returns: Bundle the arguments for this instrumentation.
Throws: if no argument Bundle has been registered.
getArguments().Description: Returns a copy of instrumentation arguments Bundle. Use this to get a @B_android#os#Bundle_E@ containing the command line arguments passed to @B_android#app#Instrumentation_E@ into your test. This Bundle is not guaranteed to be present under all instrumentations.

getInstrumentation().Description: Returns the instrumentation currently running. Use this to get an @B_android#app#Instrumentation_E@ into your test.

getContext().Description: Return the Context of this instrumentation's package. Use this to get a @B_android#content#Context_E@ representing @B_android#app#Instrumentation#getContext_E@ into your test.

ClassDesc: An exposed registry instance that holds a reference to the instrumentation running in the process and its arguments. Also provides an easy way for callers to get a hold of instrumentation, application context and instrumentation arguments Bundle.
